Class RadioGroupViewer

    public class RadioGroupViewer
extends org.eclipse.jface.viewers.AbstractListViewer
    A concrete viewer based either on a radio group.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RadioGroupViewer

        public RadioGroupViewer(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                        EEFWidgetFactory widgetFactory,
                        int numberOfColumns)
        Creates a radio group viewer on a newly-created radio group control under the given parent. The combo control is created using the given SWT style bits.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent control
        widgetFactory - the widget factory
        numberOfColumns - The number of columns to use to display the candidates

      • RadioGroupViewer

        public RadioGroupViewer(RadioGroup list)
        Creates a radio group viewer on the given radio group control.
        Parameters:
        list - the combo control
